page.title: 15ATTITUDES IN BIRMINGHAM.
page.content: WE INTERVIEWED MANY PEOPLE IN OUR BLOCK TO FIND OUT THEIR OPINIONS. MOST SEEMED TO LIKE BIRMINGHAM AND OUR AREA SAYING THERE WERE MANY FACILITIES AND THAT IT WAS A FRIENDLY COMMUNITY. THERE WERE SOME CRITICISMS,MOSTLY ABOUT VANDALISM,LITTER AND UNEMPLOYMENT. THE PEOPLE ARE OF ALL DIFFERENT RELIGIONS,COLOUR AND AGE.SOME LIVE IN LARGE HOUSES,OTHERS IN FLATS,SOME ARE RICH SOME ARE POOR. IN OUR SURVEY WE DISCOVERED THAT PEOPLE PUT A LOT OF VALUE ON POSSESSIONS.NEARLY ALL THE FAMILIES HAVE A WASHING MACHINE,HAIR DRYER AND FRIDGE.OVER 50% OF THE FAMILIES HAVE CARS,BUT ONLY ABOUT 10% HAD MORE THAN ONE.
